messages.title: IT'S A TWO HORSE RACE
messages.content: Only Labour can beat the Tories

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Funded by cuts to families, would give more money to wealthy areas than to the least well off.
Like the Tories, they'll cut child tax credits and the Child Trust Fund.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Tories

issues.education: Education policies, funded by cuts to families, would give more money to wealthy areas than to the least well off.
issues.socialWelfare: Like the Tories, they'll cut child tax credits and the Child Trust Fund.

leaflet.personalStatement: Labour hasn't been perfect, but the choice at this election isn't risk free. Change, without consequence isn't on the ballot paper.

quotes.text: Lib Dem Leader, Nick Clegg, says Britain needs "savage" cuts.

images.caption: IT'S A TWO HORSE RACE Only Labour can beat the Tories

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Ray Collins, General Secretary, the Labour Party, on behalf of the Labour Party
